stimulusHtml: Both Gaulli’s Triumph of the Name of Jesus and Rubens’ Henri IV Receives the Portrait of Marie de’ Medici express emotional drama by
choicesHtml: using asymmetrical compositions focused on diagonals and contrast between light and dark
combining a two-dimensional painting with three-dimensional relief elements
depicting human figures inside a rational architectural space with a central vanishing point
placing classically depicted figures in mysterious and wild landscape settings
